snippet: The bitcoin, a virtual currency created in 2009, has achieved a billion-dollar milestone that has turned the relatively obscure online means of exchange into a media sensation.
abstract: Noam Cohen Link By Link column investigates surging price of bitcoins, virtual currency created in 2009 that has become media sensation after amassing more than billion dollars in collective value.
lead_paragraph: The bitcoin, a virtual currency created in 2009, has achieved a billion-dollar milestone that has turned the relatively obscure online means of exchange into a media sensation.

headline.seo: Bubble or No, Virtual Bitcoins Show Real Worth
headline.main: Bubble or No, This Virtual Currency Is a Lot of Coin in Any Realm
headline.print_headline: Bubble or No, This Virtual Currency Is a Lot of Coin in Any Realm
